author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ideagen Says To Buy Medforce For A Net Consideration Of $8.7M
text:
April 6 (Reuters) - Ideagen PLC:
* ANNOUNCE ACQUISITION OF OF MEDFORCE TECHNOLOGIES INC FOR A NET CONSIDERATION OF $8.7M PAYABLE IN CASH
* CONSIDERATION FOR ACQUISITION WILL BE FINANCED PARTLY FROM COMPANY’S EXISTING CASH RESERVES AND PARTLY FROM EXISTING DEBT FACILITIES
* ACQUISITION IS EXPECTED TO BE EARNINGS ENHANCING IN COMPANY’S ACCOUNTING PERIOD BEGINNING ON 1 ST MAY 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
